HERO Simplifies Getting People Home Safe

Safety Simplified

HERO app makes it easy to get customers home safely regardless of their needs.

Increase Revenue

Get more customers and recapture your current customers on future nights by offering rewards on the app.

Reduce Liability

Offer a reward on HERO and start working toward Safe Bar Discounts on your liability insurance.

The HERO app

Quickly find the best option for you

HERO makes it easy to compare all options side by side and discover options you may not know even exist.

Get rewarded for getting home safe

Anytime you use the app to get your ride home you earn reward points toward free food, drinks, events, and experiences around town.

Cash in on being a designated driver for friends

Use HERO everytime you are a DD to earn up to $30 in rewards for being a HERO for the people you care about.

The HERO hub

Easily offer a reward for free

Offering a reward if easy. Creating an account takes less than 5 minutes.

Optimize rewards for success

Refine your designated driver rewards to maximize impact bacsed on average party size, redemption rate to increase ticket size and drive traffic to where you care about the most, your business.

Quantify you efforts

Instantly see analytics that let you know how many people you have helped get home safe. Helping lower your businesses liablility and insurance premiums.
